mapper.sql: ID, ORDER_NO, SENDER_ID, TRANSPORT_ID, RECIVER_ID, ORDER_STATUS, IS_PROBLEM, PROBLEM_CAUSE, IS_FINISH, CREATED_BY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_AT, PACK_OPERATOR, TRANSPORT_OPERATOR, RECEIVE_OPERATOR, SEND_TIME, RECEIVE_TIME, CAGE_NO, CAR_NO, CLASSIFY, TLIMIT_UP, TLIMIT_DOWN, HLIMIT_UP, HLIMIT_DOWN, ARRIVETIME, REMARKS, NUM, SAMPLECLASSIFY, SENDER, TRANSPORT, RECIVER, CITY, AREA, SIGN, SIGN1, SIGN2, SIGN3, SIGN4, SIGN5, SIGN6, ALARMTIME, ALARMTIME1, ALARMTIME2, ALARMTIME3, ALARMTIME4
mapper.update: update bio_order set ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SENDER_ID = #{senderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORT_ID = #{transportid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECIVER_ID = #{reciverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_PROBLEM = #{isProblem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROBLEM_CAUSE = #{problemCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_FINISH = #{isFinish,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PACK_OPERATOR = #{packOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORT_OPERATOR = #{transportOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECEIVE_OPERATOR = #{receiveOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_TIME = #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECEIVE_TIME = #{receivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CAGE_NO = #{cageno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_NO = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLASSIFY = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TLIMIT_UP = #{tlimitup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TLIMIT_DOWN = #{tlimitdown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HLIMIT_UP = #{hlimitup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HLIMIT_DOWN = #{hlimitdown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARRIVETIME = #{arrivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUM = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLECLASSIFY = #{sampleclassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SENDER = #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORT = #{transport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECIVER = #{reciver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN1 = #{sign1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN2 = #{sign2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN3 = #{sign3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN4 = #{sign4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN5 = #{sign5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN6 = #{sign6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALARMTIME = #{alarmtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ALARMTIME1 = #{alarmtime1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ALARMTIME2 = #{alarmtime2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ALARMTIME3 = #{alarmtime3,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ALARMTIME4 = #{alarmtime4,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bio_order oer WHERE 1 = 1 AND oer.CAGE_NO = #{cageno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND oer.ORDER_STATUS IN ('1', '2', '3')
select * from bio_order u where u.ORDER_NO = #{0}

SELECT * FROM bio_order
1=1
AND ORDER_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND ORDER_STATUS = 1
AND (ORDER_STATUS = 2 or ORDER_STATUS = 3)
AND ORDER_STATUS = 4
AND ORDER_STATUS = 5
AND (SENDER_ID = #{senderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or RECIVER_ID = #{reciverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND TRANSPORT_ID = #{transportid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or RECEIVE_OPERATOR = #{receiveOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND TRANSPORT_OPERATOR = #{transportOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY ID DESC
SELECT * FROM bio_order mo WHERE mo.CAGE_NO = #{cageno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (mo.ORDER_STATUS = 1 OR mo.ORDER_STATUS = 2 OR mo.ORDER_STATUS = 3)
SELECT * FROM bio_order mo WHERE mo.CAGE_NO = #{cageno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (mo.ORDER_STATUS = 2 OR mo.ORDER_STATUS = 3)

SELECT SENDER, count(*) as NUMS FROM bio_order
1=1 AND DATEDIFF(CREATED_AT,NOW())=-1
AND CITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND AREA LIKE CONCAT('%',#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )

SELECT SENDER, count(*) as NUMS FROM bio_order
1=1 AND DATEDIFF(CREATED_AT,NOW())=0
AND CITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
AND AREA LIKE CONCAT('%',#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )

SELECT count(*) FROM bio_order
1=1
AND SENDER_ID = #{senderid} AND IS_PROBLEM = 1 AND ORDER_STATUS = 1

SELECT count(*) FROM bio_order
1=1
AND TRANSPORT_ID = #{transportid} AND IS_PROBLEM = 1 AND ORDER_STATUS = 2

SELECT count(*) FROM bio_order
1=1
AND RECIVER_ID = #{reciverid} AND IS_PROBLEM = 1 AND ORDER_STATUS = 3
